title: [RESOLVED] March 31st 2016 - Server Issue
body:
Hey guys, 
we are aware of an issue with one of our Internet Service Provider that is affecting some ISP including INTERNODE (iInet) and SPARK (Telecom NZ).
We have contacted them and hoping to resolve it soon.
Sorry for the inconvenience and we will keep you updated.
MM

**Edit1**: As of 9.37PM (Syd Time) looks like the service is restored. Please let us know if the problem persists.
**Edit2**: As of 10.19 (Syd Time) IX Australia (who we peer with for some ISP) has restored the connections but it is possible that some ISP have disabled that route as a precaution. This means that until they restore their configuration, there might still be some issue for some players. Best at this point is to contact your ISP.

replies.body:
DODO, iPrimus and other affected players - please read this if you are still unable to connect to games.

We're working to find out where the root cause is for the issue, so If you are still unable to connect to games can you please do the following:

* Run a [trace route](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) to the OCE servers (103.240.227.5)
* Note your local IP address (you can find out by visiting http://www.whatismyip.com/)
* Note your ISP and Location (city)
* Send this info to our collection email address - ocelivereports@riotgames.com

This will hopefully give us the necessary information to find out why you are unable to connect.

Thanks!
Mindstar
Thanks for your responses folks.  We've made a change that should hopefully fix a broken path.  Please test a custom game and let me know here if you can connect now.
I still cant even update, i get an error during the update. Im on iinet

Hey - this sounds like it would be a totally different issue to the one in this thread.   What error message are you seeing?  At what point does the update process fail?

First up I'd definitely suggest you out the support page for [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) as that has quite a few things to try.

You can also always send in a [support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to get help from our player support team.

Cheers
Mindstar
iPrimus is good to go, only took 14 hours to fix this, good job ! cheers
iPrimus is working. Good job! Cheers
Can confirm, its working fine. Great job guys ! nailed it. thankyou :)

Just tried a custom and it seems to be working. But that ranked game i lost, anything to fix the reports and lp lost?
Thanks heaps!
Yeah its working once again but no loss prevention so demoted D:
I am with Dodo and also still unable to connect properly :/ Hope it's all fixed soon, feel sorry for your techs, what a nightmare for you all keep us posted :)
I lost LP, got demoted and probably got reported by everybody in my game. Is there any way to negate that game or am I left where I am? Thank you.
I see my question has been dodged.

> [{quoted}](name=ellboi660,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=FErIFkEZ,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2016-04-01T12:24:05.846+0000)
>
> I see my question has been dodged.

Unfortunately once a game has been recorded there's nothing that we can do to change the outcome of that game.  If we know that a large group of players are having issues we can do our best to make sure the game that they are apart of is loss prevented before it ends, but if it's only 1 player in a game that's having issues, it's hard to catch and prevent...especially so if it's due to an ISP issue.
Some of us with iPrimus and Dodo are experiencing the same problem. Do these two companies also use those 2 networks?
So, is there any updates on this? I just wanna play the game like the humble minion I am. :/
Cmon guys this is taking awhile ! still cannot connect. DODO NBN. fixxxx plz :///
I'm glad I'm not the only one that's still having this problem! I've reset my router 100 times and repaired my League client, this is getting ridiculous {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i know right. Sadly i dont think there is much we can do but wait patiently ... Started happening to me at 9 lastnight, havent been able to get on since.
Same {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

is there any word on what going??
at this time I am writing this I am in game but I cant connect to the game, I get an error msg saying please check your internet con and try to reconnect to the game. have tried and nothing restarted client and nothing as well so I don't no what is going on. 
I am with iprimus and I didn't no till I went looking to see if there was an issue. why weren't we told there was an issue with the sever??
please let us know next time

still the fact that nothing was said and you have none about it all day yes?? and still nothing was said about the isp not working so wtf is that about then still couldn't tell everyone on oce that there was an issue

I really don't know what are you talking about.
The issue happened 2 hours ago (time of this message)

Also try to be civil with your language.

It's not an issue with our server.
This is a fault with a Peering Provider called IX Australia. Many ISP connect directly with us as they know this is the best way to provide great quality to their customers. Some of the smaller one though use an aggregation.
IX Australia is very very good (normally) but tonight something broke on their side and this caused the issue.
When this happens, ISP diverge their traffic somewhere else. Now IX restored their service but some ISP have not restored the old routing path which is causing issues like yours.

Hope this makes sense.
This is happening to me ATM in Melb, with dodo

Ok, best is to contact your ISP. I just tried on twitter but I don't know if they look at that account overnight.
https://twitter.com/MasterMirkinen/status/715509566587281408

I was playing rank game and get disconnected while in the game, and can't reconnect. 
Gave me LOSS PREVENTED. and second game happend the same problem, cant connect the game. says(game has crushed_)
and gave me a (DEFEAT)
still waiting 4 days im pissed.... dodo..... i done the trace route but got no reply
Hi, I am with iPrimus and still having this issue as of 11:52pm Syd time. I have been placed in 5x 20 min leaver queue since I couldn't join the games :(

So sorry, this sucks!
Riot Jimz told me he was able to re-routed the traffic right now, could you try when you can to see if it works?
Thanks MasterMirkinen, just came back from weekend away and it's fixed. Any chance of getting my leaver ban lifted since it was ISP problem? Don't know if that is possible or not :) thanks

City:	Blackbutt
State:	New South Wales
Country:	AU
ISP:	M2 Telecommunications Group Ltd

My problem just got fixed too ty. I'm with some korean 3rd party isp thingo called Hana Telecom with nbn lol

Awwwww Rito.

So I managed to get back into my game, we came back and won, just check the match history.......still got slapped with Leavebuster though. Thats not fair.

Stuck in low priority now

Hey guys, just want to get a little clarification.  Those of you with DODO NBN are you able to login but after champ select the game doesn't connect/is laggy, or is logging in to the game itself the issue?
spot on bud, cant get past champion select :s

Gotcha, yeah after getting the tracerts it looks like one of the large backbones was having a routing issue causing the connection to drop.  We've made a change over here and looks like it seems to have helped.  Hopefully you guys didn't get hit too hard from the disconnects :(
Seems to be fixed :D thanks Riot
Aww, im going away in a a couple days, looks like no league for me :/

For the people using Dodo or iPrimus (like me), we and our teams won't be penalized with LP losses, right? Just want to make sure.
Pretty certain all Vocus network groups are still affected
FIXXX :3
What are ISP you using?
Im with Primus and I tried to connect and its still not working, and I have been reported. What do I have to do to get it back?, and will I get banned from the report.
are games lost because of this going to be loss prevented?
Still cannot connect, DODO NBN here. Hopefully they fix this issue soon >:| cmon dodobirdies.
can you get on yet kinky?
nah not yet nips, thanks for asking. its abit cold.
